name: Tappy Bird (Leebleh)
description:
Tappy Bird is the outcome of a  single day, solo game-jam I participated in during my second year of University, the theme of which was "Recreate an Existing game".

This game jam was a lot of fun to participate in, as it meant I got to experience recreating and seeing the development process of an existing popular game. 

For this project I used the Unity (2D) game engine and learned a lot about C# Scripting as this game jam topic allowed me to immediately start working on the game instead of spending time creating concepts.
